Package alethinophidia.utils

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BitmapLoader
    This class is used to load all the bitmaps for any object that needs them.
    CollisionSolver
    simple solver that checks if snake head hits walls/items/tails in actual moment.
    GameSettings
    Reads/Writes and holds settings values
    HiScores
    Holds scores in form of four instances of nested classes: ScoreTailDifficulty and TimeDifficultyDeaths, for each game mode.
    Step
    Simple class used to hold snake tail informations.
    SurvivalMapListManager
    small class to hold randomly arranged list of maps for the survival mode
    Transitions
    Class created just to add a little eye-candy to Fields.
    Vector2
    Simple euclidean vector representation Used by most classes to hold coordinates and do geometric calculations.
